overview: Suraj, a young boy, is wanted by an ugly old monk- Kalicharan, an aggressive gangster, Shaitan Diler Singh and a black magic practicing lady- Anita- all of whom want to sacrifice Suraj for their own evil aims. Will they succeed in doing so or will the great Sai Baba Save him is what the story is about. Watch the full movie Sai Teri Maya online, only on Eros Now.
title: Sai Teri Maya
